creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a nude man at a bathroom vanity, shaving
inscription: see Marks | on back in pencil: Bruce, Shaving
markings: on back stamped in purple and in pencil: Return to: / JOANNE LEONARD
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard (twice)
title: Man in Mirror
